|blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Yundum''' is a small town in [[Gambia]], east of the capital, [[Banjul]]. It is situated adjacent to [[Yundum International Airport|the country's international airport]]. {{coord|13|22|N|16|39|W|type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in the Gambia]] {{Gambia-geo-stub}}
